topoptlab.composite_bounds_2d module

topoptlab.composite_bounds_2d.bulkmodulus_hashin_shtrikman_low(x, bulkm_min, bulkm_max, shearm_min, shearm_max)[source]

Return the lower Hashin Shtrikman bound in 2D for the bulkmodulus of a composite consisting of two isotropic substances.

Parameters:

  • x (np.ndarray, shape (n)) – relative density

  • bulkm_min (float) – smaller bulk modulus

  • bulkm_max (float) – larger bulk modulus

  • shearm_min (float) – smaller shear modulus

  • shearm_max (float) – larger shear modulus

Returns:

bulkm_lowbound – lower bound of composite bulk modulus

Return type:

np.ndarray, shape (n)

topoptlab.composite_bounds_2d.bulkmodulus_hashin_shtrikman_upp(x, bulkm_min, bulkm_max, shearm_min, shearm_max)[source]

Return the upper Hashin Shtrikman bound in 2D for the bulkmodulus of a composite consisting of two isotropic substances.

Parameters:

  • x (np.ndarray, shape (n)) – relative density

  • bulkm_min (float) – smaller bulk modulus

  • bulkm_max (float) – larger bulk modulus

  • shearm_min (float) – smaller shear modulus

  • shearm_max (float) – larger shear modulus

Returns:

bulkm_uppbound – upper bound of composite bulk modulus

Return type:

np.ndarray, shape (n)

topoptlab.composite_bounds_2d.conductivity_hashin_shtrikman_low(x, k_min, k_max)[source]

Return the lower Hashin Shtrikman bound in 2D for the thermal conductvity of a composite consisting of two isotropic substances. Also applies to electrical conductivity and diffusion by concept of analogy.

Parameters:

  • x (np.ndarray, shape (n)) – relative density

  • k_min (float) – smaller conductivity

  • k_max (float) – larger conductivity

Returns:

k_lowbound – lower bound of composite shear modulus

Return type:

np.ndarray, shape (n)

topoptlab.composite_bounds_2d.conductivity_hashin_shtrikman_upp(x, k_min, k_max)[source]

Return the upper Hashin Shtrikman bound in 2D for the thermal conductvity of a composite consisting of two isotropic substances. Also applies to electrical conductivity and diffusion by concept of analogy.

Parameters:

  • x (np.ndarray, shape (n)) – relative density

  • k_min (float) – smaller conductivity

  • k_max (float) – larger conductivity

Returns:

k_uppbound – upper bound of composite shear modulus

Return type:

np.ndarray, shape (n)

topoptlab.composite_bounds_2d.shearmodulus_hashin_shtrikman_low(x, bulkm_min, bulkm_max, shearm_min, shearm_max)[source]

Return the lower Hashin Shtrikman bound in 2D for the shearmodulus of a composite consisting of two isotropic substances.

Parameters:

  • x (np.ndarray, shape (n)) – relative density

  • bulkm_min (float) – smaller bulk modulus

  • bulkm_max (float) – larger bulk modulus

  • shearm_min (float) – smaller shear modulus

  • shearm_max (float) – larger shear modulus

Returns:

shearm_lowbound – lower bound of composite shear modulus

Return type:

np.ndarray, shape (n)

topoptlab.composite_bounds_2d.shearmodulus_hashin_shtrikman_upp(x, bulkm_min, bulkm_max, shearm_min, shearm_max)[source]

Return the upper Hashin Shtrikman bound in 2D for the shearmodulus of a composite consisting of two isotropic substances.

Parameters:

  • x (np.ndarray, shape (n)) – relative density

  • bulkm_min (float) – smaller bulk modulus

  • bulkm_max (float) – larger bulk modulus

  • shearm_min (float) – smaller shear modulus

  • shearm_max (float) – larger shear modulus
